title: Button
introduce: You can create variable style of button

hig.title: Button
hig.subtitle: Controls
hig.description: The system offers a range of button styles that support extensive customization while providing built-in interaction states, accessibility support, and appearance adaptation. In addition, there are several system-defined button types — such as toggle, pop-up, and pull-down — that support a variety of specific use cases.

title: Background
introduce: There are variable concepts of background
